Brett Bigham , Oregon Teacher of the Year , weds Mike Turay Oregon Teacher of the Year Brett Bigham and his partner Mike Turay was among dozens who were married today at the Melody Ballroom in Southeast Portland following the ruling that struck down Oregon 's prohibition of same - sex marriage .
